APPLICATION

making it easier to manage and update different parts of the UI [91]. 
Components can be nested within each other to create complex 
interfaces.  
 
React uses a virtual DOM (Document Object Model) to efficiently update 
and render components. When the state of a component changes, 
React only updates the necessary parts of the DOM, resulting in faster 
performance and improved user experience. This approach helps to 
minimize unnecessary re-renders and optimize the rendering process.  
 
React also allows developers to create declarative and composable UI 
components. With React, developers can easily compose complex UI 
elements by combining smaller components, which helps in writing 
clean, maintainable, and modular code [92]. 
 
We decided to name our app “ضاد الرقمية” as it encapsulates how our app 
work with the Arabic language in a digital world, Figure 6.1 shows the 
home page design of our app.
